YahooLogger::setDebug ( $  debug  ) 

Enables/disables session debugging.

Parameters:
$debug Boolean to enable/disable debugging.

YahooLogger::setDebugDestination ( $  destination  ) 

Allows callers to configure where debugging output is sent.

Parameters:
$destination "LOG" to use error_log, "CONSOLE" to use printf, "NULL" to disable all logging output.
Returns:
boolean True on success, false on failure.
